Our Team

Ruairidh Duguid

Director/Producer

Ruairidh (pronounced Ruri. Don’t worry, we didn’t get it the first time either). A name tells a story, it sets us apart and it becomes our mark. In Ruairidh's case his mark could’nt be clearer, because true to the Gaelic meaning of his name, he is our red-headed king. Brimming with ideas and a dream to work behind the camera, Ruairidh began his film making career putting together showreels for actors. Scrounging to get his own gear, he discovered a love for his work and a passion for film making. As he labored over notes and ideas, he found those very notes covered in stains and marks, and Blotched Ink was born. Two years later, Ruairidh leads a team of passionate filmmakers and storytellers from around the globe. Whether it showreels, short films, commercials, whatever it may be, we love a compelling narrative which engages our audiences across a variety of platforms.

Caio Tonin Cavalcante

Director/Producer

Caio was born in Brazil and studied Film Directing in Argentina where he started his career as a video editor. Since then he has worked as a freelancer in production companies for History Channel, Discovery and Nickelodeon. He likes David Lynch, Spike Jonze, Michel Gondry, Korean movies and Pixar. Also a big fan of sports, Caio wants to do an Iron Man triathlon in the next 5 years. For 2019 his goal is to meditate and skydive.

Jack Griffiths

Producer/Actor

Coming from the land down under, Jack arrived in London to anything but mess about with spiders. After studying acting in Australia, he returned to the mother land to make his dreams a reality. An actor at heart, he thrives on bringing a creative vision to life. Jack has worked for brands such as IBM, Red Bull and Topdeck Travel and brings a wealth of creative and business experience to Blotched ink.

Roseanna Willson

Writer/Director

Rosie is from the South East of England. She is a Warner Brothers Creative Talent Scholar who graduated from the National Film and Television School Screenwriting Masters in 2018. Since then she has freelanced as a scriptwriter, editor and consultant. Rosie is passionate about writing stories with heart. Having also written for theatre, Rosie prides herself on writing strong and naturalistic dialogue. As part of the Blotched Ink team she is dedicated to writing scenes which provide actors with a moment. Walt Disney is one of her heroes and before she dies Rosie would love to be able to say she has visited every Disney theme park worldwide.
